00016    /*
00017    * Constructor.
00018    */
00019    PackedData::PackedData()
00020     : begin_(0),
00021       endAllocated_(0),
00022       endPacked_(0),
00023       cursor_(0),
00024       capacity_(0),
00025       status_(NONE)
00026    {}
00027 
00028    /*
00029    * Destructor.
00030    */
00031    PackedData::~PackedData()
00032    {  if (begin_) delete begin_; }
00033 
00034    /*
00035    * Allocate a block of memory.
00036    */
00037    void PackedData::allocate(int capacity)
00038    {
00039       if (capacity < 0) {
00040          UTIL_THROW("Negative capacity");
00041       }
00042       begin_ = new Byte[capacity];
00043       endAllocated_ = begin_ + capacity; 
00044       endPacked_= begin_;
00045       cursor_ = begin_;
00046       capacity_ = capacity;
00047       status_ = NONE;
00048    }
00049 
00050    /*
00051    * Prepare to pack data.
00052    */
00053    void PackedData::beginPacking()
00054    {
00055       cursor_ = begin_; 
00056       endPacked_ = begin_; 
00057       status_ = PACKING;
00058    }
00059 
00060    /*
00061    * Prepare to unpack data.
00062    */
00063    void PackedData::beginUnpacking()
00064    { 
00065       endPacked_ = cursor_; 
00066       cursor_ = begin_; 
00067       status_ = UNPACKING;
00068    }
00069 
00070    #if 0
00071    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00072    /*
00073    * Send a block.
00074    */
00075    void PackedData::send(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int dest)
00076    {
00077       MPI::Request request;
00078       int  sendBytes = 0;
00079       int  comm_size = comm.Get_size();
00080       int  myRank = comm.Get_rank();
00081 
00082       // Preconditions
00083       if (dest > comm_size - 1 || dest < 0) {
00084          UTIL_THROW("Destination rank out of bounds");
00085       }
00086       if (dest == myRank) {
00087          UTIL_THROW("Source and desination identical");
00088       }
00089 
00090       sendBytes = cursor_ - begin_;
00091       request = comm.Isend(begin_, sendBytes, MPI::UNSIGNED_CHAR, dest, 5);
00092       request.Wait();
00093 
00094    }
00095 
00096    /*
00097    * Receive a block.
00098    */
00099    void PackedData::recv(MPI::Intracomm& comm, int source)
00100    {
00101       MPI::Request request;
00102       int  myRank     = comm.Get_rank();
00103       int  comm_size  = comm.Get_size();
00104 
00105       // Preconditons
00106       if (source > comm_size - 1 || source < 0) {
00107          UTIL_THROW("Source rank out of bounds");
00108       }
00109       if (source == myRank) {
00110          UTIL_THROW("Source and desination identical");
00111       }
00112 
00113       request = comm.Irecv(begin_, capacity_, MPI::UNSIGNED_CHAR, source, 5);
00114       request.Wait();
00115       cursor_ = begin_;
00116 
00117    }
00118    #endif
00119    #endif
00120 
00121 }
